title: Fiction Writing Tips From Hollywood: How to Write Explosive Fiction by Mimicing Hollywood Blockbusters
description: Do you want your writing to be an explosive, page turning experience for your readers? Imagine them having the same feeling they get when they walk out of a summer blockbuster and feel so enraptured in the story that they talk about it for days. Evidenced by billion dollar grossing films, Hollywood is a master of storytelling. It knows how to capture an audience, how to move them emotionally, and how to tell stories that appeal to the masses. With the rise of eBooks, how fiction is written, discovered, and consumed is changing quickly. In a media saturated culture, what readers find appealing is directly affected by film and television. This book will teach you how to adapt your writing to a new generation of reader's needs and desires. Taking ques from some of television's hottest shows, and Hollywood's greatest films, FICTION WRITING TIPS FROM HOLLYWOOD will show you several key components of effective storytelling. Whether you're a screenwriter, a novelist, or a film buff, you will enjoy having an inside scoop on what makes Hollywood films and television shows commercially successful.
author: Jennifer Arnett
